supporting_spans: under cover of the night. But since Glenarvan's conversation with the chief, it seemed wise to abandon this design.
Kai-Koumou, who had hitherto controlled himself, trembled with rage, and his countenance was flushed with a fierce exultation.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The evidence directly contradicts the claim by showing that Kai-Koumou's tribe had lost a chief of high rank whom they were particularly anxious to recover.

analysis.claim_text: At ten he began learning tactics, spear-craft and jungle tracking from his father; at twelve he pinned a sounder of wild boar with one spear and was proclaimed “Junior Champion.” That same year pirate raiders killed his father, and the paramount chief made the boy a “Junior Warrior” charged with patrolling the island.

sub_claims.text: At ten he began learning tactics, spear-craft and jungle tracking from his father; at twelve he pinned a sounder of wild boar with one spear and was proclaimed ‘Junior Champion.’
That same year pirate raiders killed his father, and the paramount chief made the boy a ‘Junior Warrior’ charged with patrolling the island.

analysis.reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The evidence directly contradicts the claim by showing that Kai-Koumou's tribe had lost a chief of high rank whom they were particularly anxious to recover.
